title.rendered: 5 things to keep in mind while looking for a house in Noida

content.rendered:
Purchasing and investing in the house of your dreams is one of the biggest decisions of your life, it is a milestone in capital and emotional investment. Once unlocked, it is on a level laid down by financial constraints, family demands, property offerings, and personal intent.

However, the road ahead is life-changing and fulfilling. The real estate industry has set its destination to Noida, which has become one of the most lucrative options for homebuyers in recent times. Noida is the new customer favorite as it offers affordable growth & development prospects for the future. It is a housing hub owing to the wide range of segments it offers in the residential sector. The houses offer an enhanced lifestyle set-up with amenities that are anything less than a luxury. The market has set its eyes on Noida, Greater Noida, and Yamuna Expressway as options for both property possession and investment.

To aid you in your pursuit to claim the house of your dreams in this kingdom of realty luxury in Noida, we have listed a few aspects that need to carefully consider before you seal the deal.

Need:

The first step to buying a house is to define your need. Need is specific to the house that you have always envisioned. Your need is backed by your financial ability at the moment and your current lifestyle. To be able to establish your need, whether your house is for a private establishment or a family set-up, you should have your initial priorities set. Once you fixate on what your need is, you should then work on estimating the price tag on it.

Price:

Spell out your price range after weighing your financial stability and claiming a possession price that falls in between your affordability range. The money you are willing to spend revolves around your current income, monthly expenditures, and savings up-to-date. Outlining a budget is highly recommended to have a clear picture while looking for houses that are within your price range.

Noida offers Delhi NCR’s most well-planned housing with flexible rates, be it possession or renting, premium or luxury, you will always be able to find homes that meet your checkboxes. The average cost of 2-3 BHK homes in Noida is around 50% more economical than both Delhi and Gurgaon with houses that don’t compromise on quality or amenities.

Location:

Investing in a house with multiple locational advantages is highly advisable as you want to find a location that has easy access to main roads and essential services that are in close proximity. Residents are often in a spot when they have to travel long distances from work, school, or even shops. Noida Sector-144 is one of the hotspots for Delhi NCR, which was built with the intent to eliminate these issues as it has its very own Jewar International airport, excellent metro connectivity, direct roads, and upcoming bullet train project, educational hub, big malls, and complexes, and medical facilities at the convenience of your doorstep. It is the location to be. With many upcoming projects in Noida, it is not a hassle to find the home of your dreams amidst a congestion-free green city that has a lot to offer. Look for a neighborhood that has a welcoming community, one that is ideal for settlement.

House Type and Size:

Throughout our life, we dream of a house that radiates the energy that matches the momentum of our life. Homes should be centric to you and meet all your requirements. For starters, deciding on the size of our house or which features enhance it, will help eliminate houses that won’t work for you and compare the homes that will. Noida offers you holistic houses, like GulshanBotnia with apartments ranging from 2BHK to 3BHK available in every size and shape. Plan on the number of rooms you want in your house and for the family that you need to accommodate as per their lifestyle.

Nowadays a great deal of focus is laid on homes that promote the holistic wellness of its residents, with amenities like green scapes, community centers, sports complexes, spas, and meditation grounds. Concierge services and a top-tier security system with spacious parking lots are somewhat of an essential need now. After Covid, Health and Sanitization have become a priority. 

Choose your seller:

Once you’ve established how much you want to spend and where you want to live, you will be able to zero on to the house you’ve been looking for. An essential step is to decide who you want to buy the house from. You will have to juggle between several options: either from individuals (negotiation options will be more agile and precise), real estate agencies that act as an advisor that accompanies you in the purchase process, promoters, or banks.

In your quest to secure your dream house, these pointers will lend you a helping hand and thus help you make the best decision.
